params._projectId: Id of the project to accept.

params._budget: Maximum ERC20 rewards avaliable for projects of the RFP.
params._deadline: Block timestamp at which the RFP closes.
params._manager: Who will manage the RFP (become the manager).
params._tasksManager: Who will manage the project Tasks (become the OpenR&D manager).

returns.rfpId: Id of the newly created RFP.

params._deadline: Before when the proposed project will be completed.
params._nativeReward: Wanted native currency from the RFP for the project.
params._reward: Wanted rewards from the RFP for the project.

acceptProject(uint256,uint16).notice: Accept project to be funnded by the RFP.

emptyRFP(uint256).notice: Refunds any leftover budget to the creator.

escrowImplementation().notice: The base escrow contract that will be cloned for every RFP.

getRFP(uint256).notice: Retrieves all RFP information by id.

rfpCount().notice: Retrieves the current amount of created RFPs.

submitProject(uint256,string,uint64,(boo.notice: Propose a project to be funded by an RFP.
